analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BonusCrowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#463-478):
	External calls:
	- super.buyTokens(beneficiary) (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#478)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- rate (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#478)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.release (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#756-767):
	External calls:
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#758-764)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- released (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#764-765)

Reentrancy in TokenVesting.revoke (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#775-784):
	External calls:
	- balance = token.balanceOf(this) (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#776-777)
	- unreleased = releasableAmount(token) (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#777-779)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- revoked (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#781)

Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#353-368) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_contracts/0x71ae0bd9eb29fd697421cf428cd2b51727301fdf.sol#366)
